channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Oracle Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-22024|2024-08-02T09:59:28.641Z -- oracle%20corporation -- oracle%20linux
item.description: In the Unbreakable Enterprise Kernel (UEK), the RDS module in UEK has two setsockopt(2) options, RDS_CONN_RESET and RDS6_CONN_RESET, that are not re-entrant. A malicious local user with CAP_NET_ADMIN can use this to crash the kernel. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 5.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).
